original_text: Will any of you listen to my message? Will you think carefully about it in the future? Will any of you listen to my message? Will you think carefully about it in the future? Will any of you listen to my message? Will you think carefully about it in the future? Will any of you listen to my message? Will you think carefully about it in the future? Will any of you listen to my message? Will you think carefully about it in the future? Will any of you listen to my message?
korean_text: 너희 중에 누가 이 일에 귀를 기울이겠느냐 누가 뒤에 올 일을 삼가 듣겠느냐

sentences.original_text: Will any of you listen to my message?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 누가 내 메시지를 들을 것인가?

sentences.original_text: Will you think carefully about it in the future?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 미래에 그것에 대해 신중히 생각할 것인가?
